name: rescheduled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
reschedule
to agree on a new and later date for something to happen: I rescheduled my doctor's appointment for later in the week.
finance & economics
  specialized to agree that money owed can be paid back at a later date: Banks have rescheduled the debts of many developing countries .
